item.description:
Hey Everyone. Jeff Haynes and Eric Millot invite you to the mill for a fun filled photo event. The mill is a vast expanse with many photo opportunities. Lots of texture and hopefully some great stories.

You can call Jeff if you have any more questions 508-954-4955.

Enjoy and hope to see you there!!!

Scott

Don't forget to bring a tripod and a flash or two. It can be a bit dark in the mill.

Jeff and Eric would like you to meet them in the lobby next to "Fish in a Barrel" cafe.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photo Shoot at the Mill!!
